title: Start
body:
<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Carabosse! Stop terrorizing the kingdom this instant!
[[Next|1]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>> Or what, little fairy? Don't you see? Your princess is doomed and your kingdom is doomed!
[[Next|2]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> Not on my watch! I'll stop you!
[[Next|3]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>> I dare you to even try to take me on!
[[Next|5]]

<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Carabosse neutral right>> Ohohoho! Well, this should be entertaining!
[[Next|4]]
<<setsprite DialgoueRunner Talia neutral left>> (Princess...  I'll defeat Carabosse and save you!)
